channel.title: BMS alien models for OC HL1 aliens?
channel.description: I was wondering for quite some time. Would the Black Mesa Source team be willing to give their models for HL1 aliens (Like Gargs, Gonarch, Alien Controllers, etc.) to the Obsidian Conflict team to use for their HL1 monsters? Because I realize that the GoldSrc models that Obsidian Conflict uses don't really fit in with a Source mod, and since you guys are making them into Source, they should use it.

item.title: BMS alien models for OC HL1 aliens?
item.dc:creator: Mr.Shadow
item.description:
RabidMonkey:

This is a question best asked once the mod is out; it’s also up to them whether they even want to use our models at all!

^this. Maybe they want to have the zergsquid from OBM, instead of the actual bullsquid from BM.

Read full topic
item.source: BMS alien models for OC HL1 aliens?

item.title: BMS alien models for OC HL1 aliens?
item.dc:creator: Slunket
item.description:
FFFUUU:

Yeah, and I did, and now they said the BMS team should contact them instead of me when they’re done.

i am confus

item.title: BMS alien models for OC HL1 aliens?
item.dc:creator: Slunket
item.description:
FFFUUU:

While playing with one of the devs in OC today in their official server, I asked him (Linkmister) about it. He said that if you guys contact them once you’re finished with the mod he’ll consider it.

Wait wasnt it you that wanted to contact them?

Read full topic

item.title: BMS alien models for OC HL1 aliens?
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
She’s not a developer in the sense that its her decision whether or not materials and models are to be shared. She did some voicework and maybe some other work, but you’d be much better suited PMing a developer like Raminator, who IIRC, is one of the lead devs.

Plus Catz hasn’t been too active recently for various reasons.

EDIT: ninja’d

Read full topic
